attributes.action: Impose heavy fines on any vehicle driver found guilty of spilling diesel on UK roads and causing a severe threat to all other road users – especially motorcyclists.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Due to the size, capacity and placement of diesel fuel tanks on large vehicles they are often filled to the brim and capped with poorly fitting caps which leak diesel on the carriageway on every bend and roundabout within a few miles of being filled.
The resulting unexpected skid can be quite scary in a car but is often catastrophic on a motorcycle.
Every motorcyclist knows someone who has lost control due to diesel spills and far too many know of someone who has died as a result of a diesel user who couldn’t be bothered to think of others.
Please sign this to encourage the government to make these drivers think of others.
